Header: Customs takes stricter trade union action
Content: Customs Trade Unions Alliance’ has decided to make their work-to-rule action stricter. The Alliance stated that the decision was made as they have not yet received a positive response for their requests from the Ministry of Finance. Meanwhile, Essential Food Commodities’ Importers and Traders Association stated that a shortage of essential commodities may arise due to the work-to-rule action of customs officers.
